tags.name: ef-canvas
tags.description:
A Component uses to draw graphics on a web page,
it works similarly to the normal HTML5 Canvas element.

attributes.name: autoloop
attributes.description:
Starts an automatic animation loop.
Enabling the frame event.

properties.name: autoloop
properties.description:
Starts an automatic animation loop.
Enabling the frame event.

properties.name: context
properties.description: The 2 dimensional context of the canvas, used for drawing

events.name: frame
events.description: dispatched when next Frame event occurs when autoloop is set to true

methods.name: getContext
methods.description:
Return context of canvas,
support only 2D mode
